MajorClaims.Text: I prefer to spend my entire live in one place which is my hometown
staying in one place is better than moving number of places

Claims.Text: In my hometown, I have a lot of friends and good relationships, I love the traffic in here, and the environment is wonderful
If anyone needs help, his neighbor will help as much as possible
I also love the environment in here
Moving some places can give to you a lot of experiences

Premises.Text: Nowhere else can give me some people like in here
In here, I have a lot of friends, and we usually spend free time to play sports like soccer, basketball and of course we have a lot of fun
Every people in my town have known each others, and we have good relationships
We have large streets but few cars
we can move easily to anywhere
Last week, I went to the city center to meet my friends
The traffic in the city was too crowed
I have to wait for an hour to go to my friend house
I love the traffic system in here
I have been gone to some places to travel and stay for a short time, and I realize that the environment in some place isn't clean and fresh like my home town
There were a lot of people
the environment can't be keep clean
living in one place like your hometown can make you feel comfortable about the traffic, people and of course the environment
